item.title: Getting Started with Cadence
item.description: Introduction A number of basic Cadence tutorial videos are available on YouTube.

item.title: Configuring Cadence (Standalone Installation)
item.description: Before using Cadence, configure it for optimal performance by following the instructions below.

item.title: What is Cadence?
item.description: Cadence is an electronic computer-aided drafting (ECAD) program commonly used in industry for the design and simulation of electronic circuits and printed circuit boards.
